parameter.name: user
parameter.description: Custom templates for this user account. Defaults to true.

parameter.name: gallery
parameter.description: Templates from our Gallery. Note that some templates that require extra configuration are withheld. (eg, the Etsy template). Defaults to false.

parameter.name: base
parameter.description: Mailchimp's 'start from scratch' extremely basic templates.

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: Optional for Gallery templates only, limit to a specific template category.

parameter.name: folderId
parameter.description: User templates, limit to this folder_id.

parameter.name: includeInactive
parameter.description: User templates are not deleted, only set inactive. defaults to false.

parameter.name: inactiveOnly
parameter.description: Only include inactive user templates. defaults to false.

parameter.name: includeDragAndDrop
parameter.description: Include templates created and saved using the new Drag & Drop editor.
